overview: “Transported by the music of bad weather, a passer-by seeks slowness at the bend of a metro train, an ice rink or a sewer. »  Kaël Mercader's project as part of his residency at La Bande Vidéo is an exploration of the possibilities offered by the pin screen. Interested in ancient animation techniques, the artist has produced a film related to his favorite subjects: observation drawing, technical drawing, the human figure and narrative figuration.
title: Ductile et pluvial
